posts.post_content:
SOLD 
Up for sale is this T206 Matty white cap, graded PSA 1.5 with PWCC A eye appeal sticker.

$1050 shipped via USPS Priority. Price is net to me, multiple payment methods accepted. Will consider trades for other T206 cards. 

[IMG]https://i.imgur.com/6L1nyPs.png[/IMG]

[IMG]https://i.imgur.com/1d5GTBo.png[/IMG]
That’s a really nice 1.5 for the grade. Good luck with the sale.
